Function reference

Package documentation

oncomsm-package oncomsm
The oncomsm package.

Functions

sample_prior()
Sample model prior parameters
sample_posterior()
Sample model posterior parameters
sample_predictive()
Sample data from predictive distribution of a model
impute_predictive()
Impute data from predictive distribution
impute_trial()
Impute data from predictive distribution
generate_visit_data()
Generate Visit data from a multi-state model

Abstract model interface

format(<Model>) print(<Model>) sample_prior(<Model>) sample_posterior(<Model>) sample_predictive(<Model>) impute_predictive(<Model>) impute_trial(<Model>) parameter_sample_to_tibble(<Model>) plot_mstate(<Model>) generate_visit_data(<Model>) sample_pfs_rate(<Model>) mstate_to_visits(<Model>)
An abstract multi-state model class

Stable-Response-Progression (SRP) model

mstate_to_visits(<srp_model>) create_srp_model() format(<srp_model>) plot_mstate(<srp_model>)
A Stable-Response-Progression Model

Utility functions

logodds()
Log-odds function
visits_to_mstate()
Convert longitudinal visit data to time-to-event data
mstate_to_visits()
Convert data from multi-state to visit format
plot_mstate()
Swimmer-like plot of multi-state data
parameter_sample_to_tibble()
Convert stanfit sample to data table
sample_pfs_rate()
Sample from the progression-free-survival rate
